Recount how Zacchaeus changed his behaviour positively.
Demonstrate integrity when using money.
Discuss why it is important to repent sins in order to be like Christ.

Apply the story in their lives by obeying God’s instructions.
Acquire the value of love by speaking good things about others.
Acknowledge God’s greatness by revering Him in his/her day to day life.

Recognize God’s power over death and believe in Resurrection.

Appreciate the miracle by praying to God when faced with challenges.

Describe the parable of the lost coin and its significance in day to day lives.

Describe how the Kingdom of God grows from a small beginning.

Appreciate the growth of God’s kingdom by evangelizing to others.

State the importance of telling the truth always.
